desc: Do it yourself crown molding. Nail free installation, easy application. Use the molding contractors prefer.

layout.text: Shop now for the best selection of high quality, easy to use crown molding delivered right to your door.
Please allow 1-2 weeks for production added to our standard 7-10 business days shipping time. Thank you for your understanding.
Shipping 8 foot lengths is expensive! To help lower shipping costs, our DIYer products come in 4 foot lengths.
